#summary How to install strategico

= Requirements =

You need to install 
 * the [http://www.r-project.org R] (release >= 2.11) statistical software

and the following R libraries (see [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ CRAN] for a full list of R libraries):
 * futile.logger
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/hwriter/index.html hwriter]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RODBC/index.html RODBC library]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/forecast/index.html Forecast library] that requires fracdiff and tseries
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/R2HTML/index.html R2HTML library]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RUnit/index.html runit]
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/xtable/index.html Xtable library]
 * [http://sirio.stat.unipd.it/index.php?id=libast Ast library]

= Installation =

Download strategico.zip from [http://code.google.com/p/strategico/downloads/list Download tab] and unzip it into a folder like /apps/strategico (Linux) or C:\strategico
